title: Did the person who died have assets in another name
question: Did {deceasedName} have assets in another name?
intestacyParagraph1: You may find it helpful to check any documents you have from {deceasedName}, for example bank statements, to see if they used a different name or spelling.
GopParagraph1: The grant of probate will list all names that you give us.
GopParagraph2: The person who died could have used their maiden name, a nickname, or a different spelling of their name for some of their assets. You may find it helpful to check any documents you have from the person who died, for example, bank statements, property deeds or records of any shares they held, to see if they used a different name.
warningText: If there are any assets held in names that are not listed on the grant of probate, you may have difficulties accessing them.

alias.required: Select ‘Yes’ if {deceasedName} had assets in another name
